content: **knitted hat in drops sky / drops merino extra fine and drops kid-silk the piece is worked bottom up with honeycomb pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern skip-177 yarn group b + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits head-size approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm **materials ** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50-50-50 g colour 03 grey fog and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25-25 g colour 38 chalk or use drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50-100-100 g colour 08 light beige and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25-25 g colour 38 chalk needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm 22 stitches in width with bee-cube pattern and 1 strand of each quality = 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
